abstract: Netflix reported worldwide revenue of $719 million for the quarter, and said it had gained an average of 1.1 million subscribers each month in the first quarter of this year.
snippet: Netflix reported worldwide revenue of $719 million for the quarter, and said it had gained an average of 1.1 million subscribers each month in the first quarter of this year.
lead_paragraph: 4:49 p.m. | Updated | Netflix now boasts more subscribers than any other video service in the United States.

headline.main: For Netflix, Higher Earnings and a Milestone
